name: My Roots. My Origin
description:
You play as a cyborg investigator working for the Ministry of Information. After a stressful day, he begins to look through his broken memories.

Game,  Art and Music by me

Made on the Bitsy Game Engine

This was a project I made over 2 days for the Global Game Jam 2023 on the theme "Roots"

Diversifiers used:

  • Off The Beaten Track: Use an open source game engine that is not well known.
  •  Slava Ukraini: Recognize the struggle of the Ukrainian nation for freedom by using the shades of blue and yellow in your game palette.
  • The Number 23: It’s 2023. The number 23 represents change, progress, innovation, new beginnings, revolution, and transformation. Integrate one or more of these themes into your game.
  • Is This The End?: Make a game with multiple endings.

Check out the other games from our jam site

Controls + Other Notes
  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move/Interact
  • You should be able to play in any browser with HDML.
  • VOLUME WARNING: Music may be loud, lower volume before playing.
  • Look for the sparkles, maybe they'll help you who remember you were?
Music Track 
  1.  Yellow Bellied Coward
  2.  Blue Interrogation
  3. The Unmaking of Me
